body_html:
I've added support to get feature importances during inference/eval time. It should make its way into the nightly build shortly, and an unknown amount of time into an official TF release. You can just pass report_feature_importances to the estimator=True, and add an eval metric such as:
tf.contrib.learn.metric_spec.MetricSpec(
lambda x: x,
prediction_key=eval_metrics.FEATURE_IMPORTANCE_NAME)
body_text:
I've added support to get feature importances during inference/eval time.  It should make its way into the nightly build shortly, and an unknown amount of time into an official TF release.   You can just pass report_feature_importances to the estimator=True, and add an eval metric such as:
tf.contrib.learn.metric_spec.MetricSpec(
lambda x: x,
prediction_key=eval_metrics.FEATURE_IMPORTANCE_NAME)
body:
I've added support to get feature importances during inference/eval time.  It should make its way into the nightly build shortly, and an unknown amount of time into an official TF release.   You can just pass report_feature_importances to the estimator=True, and add an eval metric such as:
tf.contrib.learn.metric_spec.MetricSpec(
          lambda x: x,
          prediction_key=eval_metrics.FEATURE_IMPORTANCE_NAME)
